name: leavings
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the things that a person or an animal leaves when they have finished doing something: The leavings from the grinding of seeds and grain will be checked for starch and protein content. Wild animals find it easy to live off the leavings of people.
More examplesFewer examplesHe gave me the leavings from what he had prepared that night.The tiny frame house is cluttered from floor to ceiling with a lifetime's leavings. Characters reconstruct crimes by inspecting stab wounds, bloodstains and other grisly leavings.
